description.value: A set of concept properties used by UTG to maintain legacy terminology distribution systems

valueString.value: used only in v2-tables.xml

definition.value: General kind of Content Logical Definition for the value set informing the table, as printed in the V2 ballot

valueString.value: used only in v2-tables.xml

definition.value: OID of the code system associated with the table

valueString.value: used only in v2-tables.xml

definition.value: URI of the code system associated with the table

valueString.value: used only in v2-tables.xml

definition.value: Indicates that although still being published in the V2 international standard, the table has been deprecated in favor of alternative codes, and will be withdrawn in the future.

valueString.value: used only in v2-tables.xml

definition.value: flag used in the V2 publishing spece for generation of table content in the pdf document

valueString.value: used only in v2-tables.xml

definition.value: Status of the table as published in the V2 ballots

valueString.value: used only in v2-tables.xml

definition.value: steward workgroup for the table

valueString.value: used only in v2-tables.xml

definition.value: OID value for the table object

valueString.value: used only in v2-tables.xml

definition.value: Type of V2 table, e.g. HL7 or User

valueString.value: used only in v2-tables.xml

definition.value: Version of the code system informing the table

valueString.value: used only in v2-tables.xml

definition.value: HL7 V2 version when the table was introduced

valueString.value: used only in v2-tables.xml

definition.value: Associated Concept Domain for the table

valueString.value: used only in v2-tables.xml

definition.value: OID of the value set informing the table

valueString.value: used only in v2-tables.xml

definition.value: String holding the segment and field where the table is bound in the interational standard.

valueString.value: used only in v2-tables.xml

definition.value: Associates a concept domain with th ActClass code that it is intended to be associated with, ie for late binding, informs the IG devloper which code should be populated in ActClass when a value sset for ActCode is being bound.

valueString.value: used only in concept domains; in the coremif called 'ConceptualSpaceForClassCode'

definition.value: One of the types of concept relationships that implements qualifying relationships

valueString.value: This needs reexamination to see how it is represented in UTG and if it correct; in V3 relationships between concepts in the same code system are represented internal to the system, not as a map. Note that we have an extension for code systems for 'conceptrelationshipkind'

definition.value: Name of inboundRelationship from Act to ActReln

valueString.value: used only in structural code system content

definition.value: Formal name of outboundRelationship from Act to ActReln

valueString.value: used only in structural code system content

definition.value: Name of relationship from Act to Participation

valueString.value: used only in structural code system content

definition.value: The name of the assciation from ActRelationship to the source Act

valueString.value: used only in structural code system content

definition.value: The name of the assciation from ActRelationship to the source Act

valueString.value: used only in structural code system content

definition.value: The formal name for the class clone under this code

valueString.value: used only in structural code system content

definition.value: The name of the relationship from the Entity to the playedRole

valueString.value: used only in structural code system content

definition.value: The name of the relationship from the Entity to the scopedRole

valueString.value: used only in structural code system content

definition.value: The formal name for relationship from Participation to Act

valueString.value: used only in structural code system content

definition.value: The name of the relationship from Participation to Role

valueString.value: used only in structural code system content

definition.value: Name of inboundLink relationship from Role to RoleLink

valueString.value: used only in structural code system content

definition.value: Name of outboundLink relationship from Role to RoleLink

valueString.value: used only in structural code system content

definition.value: Name of relationship from Role to Participation

valueString.value: used only in structural code system content

definition.value: The name of the relationship from Role to the payer Entity

valueString.value: used only in structural code system content

definition.value: The name of the relationship from Role to the scoper Entity

valueString.value: used only in structural code system content

definition.value: Property applies to concepts in the CodeSystem Code System. The property holds the OID that uniquely identifies the code system represented by this coded concept.

valueString.value: This code system of code systems was retired a long time ago, and should not be in UTG so this property is unnecessary
not certain where this came from

definition.value: Sort key for the inboundRelationship from Act to ActReln; used to publish the RIM

valueString.value: used only in ObservationMethod, and appears to link types of tests with equipment, manufacturers, reagents, or organisms.

definition.value: If true, indicates that ActRelationships or Participations of the specified type (and any specializations thereof) will normally conduct. For more usage information, refer to the Core Principles specification.
Haven't a clue!

valueString.value: used only in ObservationMethod, and appears to link types of tests with equipment, manufacturers, reagents, or organisms.

definition.value: The internal identifier for the concept in the HL7 Access database repository.

valueString.value: this should not be migrated to UTG

definition.value: Property applies to the ConceptCodeRelationship code system. For each concept, it identifies the name of the inverse relationship.

valueString.value: only used in the code system of contept relationships.. Forgot we had this. Not sure how it should be modeled in UTG.

definition.value: If true, indicates that the Act attribute or association (as represented by a typeCode for eaither ActRelationship or Pareticipation is a descriptor of the document (record) represented by the act object. If false, indicates the property is a descriptor of the action itself, actual, intended, or potential. Applies to interpretation of attributes and associations with respect to changes in the value of Act.actionNegationInd and Act.moodCode. (See descriptions of these attributes for further discussion.) For example, in an order, the id attribute [isDocumentCharacteristic = true] is an identifier of the record of the order, not an identifier of the intended event. On the other hand, the code attribute [isDocumentCharacteristic = false] describes a characteristic of the intended event.

valueString.value: This may not behave the same based on the final outcome from the negation project. Or this may be the impleentation of their recommendations; need to discuss with Rob Hausam. Clear the this is used as part of RIM documentation. Note that this is only used in these two structural code systems.
